data.name: index_scheddesc
data.value: Turn scheduled checking of monitors on or off, and set the address to which failures are automatically emailed.

data.name: index_oldtime
data.value: Status from last scheduled check at $1

data.name: index_refreshdesc
data.value: Perform an immediate refresh of all monitor statuses, instead of waiting for the next scheduled update.

data.name: index_tmplsdesc
data.value: View and edit templates used to construct email messages sent when monitored services go down.

data.name: mon_warndef
data.value: Yes, and use default reporting mode

data.name: mon_warn1
data.value: Yes, and report on status changes

data.name: mon_warn0
data.value: Yes, and report when going down

data.name: mon_ondown
data.value: If monitor goes down, run command

data.name: mon_onup
data.value: If monitor comes up, run command

data.name: mon_ontimeout
data.value: If monitor times out, run command

data.name: mon_elogin
data.value: Invalid login for RPC on Webmin server $1

data.name: mon_eremote2
data.value: Webmin server $1 could not be contacted : $2

data.name: mon_estatus
data.value: Webmin server $1 does not have the System and Server Status module

data.name: mon_ecannot
data.value: You are not allowed to edit monitors

data.name: mon_ertype
data.value: This monitor type is not available on $1

data.name: mon_oninfo
data.value: Note: Commands will only be run when email is sent

data.name: mon_efails
data.value: Missing or invalid number of failures

data.name: mon_email
data.value: Also send email for this service to

data.name: mon_depend
data.value: Don't check if monitor is down

data.name: mon_edepend
data.value: A monitor cannot depend on itself

data.name: mon_enoremote
data.value: No hosts or groups to run on selected

data.name: sched_ehours
data.value: No hours to run during selected

data.name: sched_edays
data.value: No days to run on selected

data.name: sched_ecannot
data.value: You are not allowed to edit scheduled monitoring

data.name: sched_eemailserver
data.value: Your mail server is not installed : $1

data.name: depends_mod
data.value: The module $1 is not installed on your system

data.value: The module $1 is not supported on your system

data.name: depends_remote
data.value: The module $1 is not supported on server $2

data.name: http_eregexp
data.value: No regular expression for page to match entered

data.name: http_ehead
data.value: The HEAD request method cannot be used when checking for a regular expression

data.name: ping_econfig
data.value: No ping command has been set in Module Config

data.name: proc_thresh
data.value:
Number of process that must exist for
monitor to consider them running

data.name: proc_ethresh
data.value: Missing or invalid number of processes

data.name: proc_easuser
data.value: User for process to run as does not exist

data.name: exec_cmd
data.value: Command to check exit status of

data.name: file_file
data.value: File, directory or pattern to check

data.name: file_efile
data.value: Missing file or directory name to check

data.name: traffic_desc
data.value: This monitor keeps track of network traffic on a selected interface, and displays the monitor as down if the traffic exceeds the number of bytes per second entered below. This only really works well if scheduled monitoring is enabled at set to a short interval, like every 5 minutes.

data.name: traffic_eifaces
data.value: Your operating system does not have a /proc/net/dev file

data.name: traffic_ebytes
data.value: Missing or invalid number of bytes/second

data.name: space_epc
data.value: Missing or invalid free space percentage

data.name: load_emax
data.value: Missing or invalid maximum load average

data.name: load_ecmd
data.value: The <tt>uptime</tt> command was not found on your system

data.name: load_efmt
data.value: The output of the <tt>uptime</tt> command could not be parsed

data.name: change_file
data.value: File or directory to monitor (fail if changed)

data.name: jabber_eparser
data.value: The Perl module $1 is not installed on your system.

data.name: memory_emin
data.value: Missing or invalid amount of free real memory

data.name: memory_eproc
data.value: Webmin does not know how to check free memory on your operating system

data.name: memory_eminswap
data.value: Missing or invalid amount of free virtual memory

data.name: proftpd_etype
data.value: This monitor cannot be used when ProFTPD is run stand-alone

data.name: mailserver_desc
data.value: The address below must be an autoresponder that replies to the source address with the same Subject: line.

data.name: oldfile_file
data.value: File to monitor (fail if not changed)

data.name: refresh_doing
data.value: Refreshing the status of all monitors ..

data.name: refresh_doing2
data.value: Refreshing the status of $1 selected monitors ..

data.name: sensors_cmd
data.value: The command <tt>sensors</tt> is not installed on your system. This monitor requires the lm_sensors package be installed to operate.

data.name: sensors_none
data.value: No sensors were detected on your system. You may need to run the <tt>sensors-detect</tt> initialization command.

data.name: nut_cmd
data.value: The command <tt>upsc</tt> is not installed on your system. This monitor requires the NUT package be installed and configured to operate.
